missionDescription: Implement a runnable notebook + CSV template in /outputs with (a) default assumptions by segment (fleet, classic, specialty), (b) sensitivity toggles (energy price, utilization, battery replacement, financing), and (c) preloaded standard drive-cycle proxies (urban/last-mile, mixed, highway) so users can compare ICE vs conversion vs BEV.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Turns the business-model work into a quantitative, repeatable decision tool by tying vehicle duty cycle to TCO (CAPEX, energy, maintenance, downtime). This directly supports pricing, fleet ROI justifi...
